azurewrath.desc: lucky hit your skills have up to a chance to freeze enemies for seconds and deal cold damage to them.

crown_of_lucion.desc: each time you use a skill with a resource Cost, gain increased damage and resource cost is increased by for seconds, stacking up to times.
crown_of_lucion.full: Each time you use a Skill with a Resource Cost, gain {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c}%[x] increased damage and Resource Cost is increased by 30%[+] for 4 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

eyes_in_the_dark.desc: death trap deals increased damage and will re-arm itself a second time.
eyes_in_the_dark.full: {c_important}Death Trap{/c} deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage and will re-arm itself a second time.
